Translations.Text: Alo. Tazmamt, issekniyen iS ppuuewwben, sinna, ppufeuulen s$uo Uuwib i Ipwaxebboen
Ur aabdet siwa Oebbi. Nek, s$uoeS $uowen, d aneddao u d abcir
Ssutret ssmae i Mass nnwen, steooaet aS, ad Ifeooeo fellawen afeooeo ilhan, ar lajel ipwassnen. Ippak lfevl iS i yal bab n lfevl. Ma twexxoem, nekk ugade$ a ppeppuaqbem, ass ameqwran
Tu$alin nnwen, ar Oebbi. Neppa Izmer i yal cci
Day nitni, s tidep, ur snefvasen ara idmaren nnsen, iwakken ad ffren fellaS? Xas $ummen s iceiiiven nnsen, day ur Ieoa ara ayen teffren akked wayen d qqaoen? Neppa, s tidep, Issen i illan deg idmaren
Ur illi lweec di tmurt, mebla ma illa ooeeq is ar Oebbi. Issen tanezdu$t is, tanielt is. Meooa, di Tezmamt ipbegginen

D Neppa i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan di sdis wussan. Asgeld iS illa $ef waman. A kwen Ijeooeb anwi segwen ara ixedmen ayen ilhan, sennig wiyav. Ma tenniv: "ih, kunwi a d tekkrem deffir tmeppant nnwen", wid ijehlen, war ccekk, a d inin: "ayagi, kan, d sseur n uuee
Ma Neswexxeo asen aaaqeb ar imir ipwassnen, war ccekk, a d inin: "d acu iT iiifen"? Ass ideg ara ten id iawev, day illa wa ara ten iveoofen segs? Ad asen izzi wayen i$ef pmmaaliken
Ma Neseess i umdan aeunu nne¨£, sinna, Nekkes as t, atan ad iayes, ad ijhel
Ma Neseess as l$it, deffir twa$it i t innulen, atan ad yini: "fukkent felli lemeayen", d$a, neppa, ad ifoee, ad izux
Kkes ed wid iuebboen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan. I widak ssmae akked tikci meqqwoen
Ahat teppaoav kra n wayen ik ed ippuweeean. Pzemmiven yis idmaren ik mara qqaoen: "a lemmer i s d irs ugerruj, ne$ idda d, yides, lmelk"! Kecc d aneddao kan. Oebbi d Awkil n yal cci
Ne$ ad inin: "isnulfa t id". Ini: "awit ed, s usnulfu, mraw n tsuotin am neppa. Naaoet ayen iwumi tzemrem, war Oebbi, ma tessawalem tidep
Ma ur awen d rran ara, cfut ar irs ed kan s tussna n Oebbi, ar ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. Ihi, ma kunwi d imvuaen
I wid ib$an tameddurt n ddunit akked ooeue is, a Nkafi, degs, igiten nnsen, ur asen Ntekkes
Widak, ur ppafen, di laxeot, siwa times. Ad i$li wayen uenaen degs; inqev wayen xeddmen

Day win iddan d ubeggen, s$uo Mass is, u immal as t unagi s$uoeS…? U, uqbel is, Tazmamt n Musa, d nnhaya u d aeunu. Wigi umnen yis. Win i p inekoen, seg ikubar, ppaaud is d times. Ur ppili di ccekk fellas. Neppa, ih, d tidep s$uo Mass ik. Maca, tegwti n medden ur ppamnen
Anwa idensen sennig win id isnulfan tikerkas $ef Oebbi? Wigi a d rsen i Mass nnsen. A d inin inagan: "d wigi i iskaddben $ef Mass nnsen". Day Oebbi ur Ixezzu yara imednas
I isiixxioen seg ubrid n Oebbi, i t issarmen d uawij, nitni ur uminen s laxeot
Wigi, ur sfunnugen di tmurt, ur asen illi bab, war Oebbi. Fellasen aaaqeb ar wayev. Ur zmiren ad slen, ur pwalin
D wigi i isxesoen iman nnsen. Itelf iten wayen d snulfuyen
Ur illi ccekk, ih, nitni ad xesoen, di laxeot, sennig wiyav
Ih, wid iumnen, u xeddmen ayen ilhan, u unzen aS i Mass nnsen, widak d at Loennet, degs ad wekkoen
Amedya n snat n trebbuyaa am uder$al, uaeeug, akked win ipwalin, win isellen. Day aadlen sin imedyaten agi? Day ur d tesmektayem ara
Ni$ Nuzen ed Nue i ugdud is: "nek d aneddao nnwen ipbegginen
iwakken ur taabdem siwa Oebbi. Nek ugaded aaaqeb fellawen, ass aqeohan
Nnan imvebboen, wid ijehlen, seg ugdud is: "kecc, $uone$, d amdan am nekwni. Nwala, d oodiyen nne$, kan, war ameyyez, i k ivefoen. Ur nwala s wacu i $ tifem. Xaii, neesb ikwen d ikeddaben
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Acu twalam ma ddi$ d ubeggen n Mass iw? Ifka yi d aeunu s$uoeS. Idreg fellawen. Day a t neeppem fellawen, ma kunwi tugim t
A yagdud iw! Ur awen ssuture$ ayla, ilmend is; taqdiat iw ar Oebbi kan. Ur ppara$, nek, wid iumnen. S tidep, ad mlilen d Mass nnsen. Maca, nek wala$ kwen d agdud ur nessin
A yagdud iw! Acu ara yi isellken seg ufus n Oebbi, lemmer i ten rri$ akin, day ur d tesmektayem ara

Ur awen qqaoe$: $uoi lexzayen n Oebbi. Ur ssine$ tabavnit. Ur qqaoe$: nek d lmelk. Ur qqaoe$ i wid eeqoent wallen nnwen: ur asen Ippak ara Oebbi lxio, d awez$i. Yif akw Oebbi akken Ieoa, i illan deg iman nnsen. Mulac ad ili$ seg imednas
Nnan: "a Nue! Ni$ tnamrev a$, tessugtev a$ anamer. Ihi, awi ya$ d ayen i $ taahdev, ma tessawalev tidep
Inna: "d Oebbi kan ar awen t id Iawin, ma ihwa yaS. Kunwi ur tesfunnugem
Xas b$i$ a kwen neuee$, ur tesfaydayam seg wanuae iw, ma Ib$a Oebbi a kwen Itlef. Neppa d Mass nnwen; tu$alin nnwen $uoeS
Ne$ qqaoen: "isnulfa t id". Ini: "ma snulfa$ t id, lbe$wv iw i yiri w. Nek, ur ppka$ di lbe$wv nnwen
Ippuweeea d i Nue: "ur ippamen yiwen, d awez$i, seg ugdud ik, siwa wid illan umnen. Ihi, ur k icqi wayen xeddmen
Eunaa lbabuo, ger wallen nne£, s uweeei nne£. Ur iyI d pmeslay $ef wid idensen, war ccekk, ad $emqen
La iuennaa lbabuo. Yal tikelt ara aaddin $uoes imvebboen n ugdud is, tkaariren fellas. Inna: "ma temmaalkem degne$, ihi, a nemmaalek degwen akken temmaalkem
Deqqal a ppeeoem, u$uo ara d ias uaaqeb ara t isdullen, ara ieaz uaaqeb imezgi
Alamma, mi d iusa lameo nne£, la pfeggiven igwefran d ihedman, Nenna: "awi degs tayuga n yal uuenf, tawacult ik - siwa wid i$ef id izwar wawal -, akked wid iumnen". Drus kan i iumnen yides
Inna: "rekbet degs, s yisem n Oebbi, acali s akked trusi s. Mass iw, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Icula yissen, di lemwao anect idurar. Issawel Nue i mmi s, i illan weedes: "a mmi ali d yidne$, ur teppiliv ar ijehliyen
Inna: "uuoan iw d adrar, ad iyi isellek seg waman". Inna: "assa, ulac leslak si lameo n Oebbi, siwa i win i$ef Ieun". Aaddant lemwao garasen. Iuebe ed seg wid ipwa$emqen
Nnan: "a tamurt, seblaa aman im, a yigenni euufu". Aman zzren. Iuao lameo: irs $ef Loudi. Iffe$ uberrae: akin agdud imednas
Inuj Nue ar Mass is, inna: "a Mass iw! Ni$ mmi n twacult iw. Ih, lemaahda K d tidep, Kecc Tifev akw imeaddan
Inna: "a Nue! Neppa, s tidep, ur illi n wacult ik. Ih, neppa ur ixdim ayen ilhan. Ihi, ur iyI d steqsay $ef wayen ur tessinev. Nek a k Ssakwaye$, ur teppiliv seg wid ur nessin
Inna: "a Mass iw! Ili di laawen iw, iwakken ur K id steqsaye$ $ef wayen ur ssine$. Ma ur iyi Tsemmeev, ur Teunev felli, ad ili$ seg imexsuoen
Nnan d: "a Nue! Ers ed s tifrat s$uone£, akked lbaoaka, fellak akw $ef leoyus i illan yidek. Kra n legyus, a ten N$it. Sinna, fellasen s$uone£, aaaqeb aqeoean
Tagi si tequivin n tbavnit, Nweeea yak tent. Ur tent tessinev, kecc, ne$ agdud ik, uqbel wagi. Ihi, eubeo, taggara, war ccekk, i wid ipeezziben
I Aad, gmat sen Hud, inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi! Ur tesaim oebbi, war Neppa. Kunwi tesnulfuyem d kan
A yagdud iw! Ur awen ssuture$ taqdiat $ef waya. Taqdiat iw ar Win kan, iyi d Ixelqen. Day ur tefhimem ara
A yagdud iw! Ssutret ssmae i Mass nnwen, sinna, steooaet aS. Ad awen d Isse$li ageffur d ihedman, ad awen irnu tazmert i tezmert nnwen. Ur ppu$alet d ibe$wviyen
Nnan as: "a Hud! Ur a$ d tusid s ubeggen, ur neppaoa, nekwni, ioebbiten nne$, ilmend n wawal ik, ur numin yisek
Neqqao kan, d kra ioebbiten nne$, i k i$eoqen". Inna: "nek, Anagi w d Oebbi, u cehhdet ar ur ppka$ ara deg wayen tepcarakem
war Neppa. Ihi, andit iyi akken ma tellam, sinna ur iyi sganayet
Nek, ppekle$ af Oebbi, Mass iw u Mass nnwen. Ur illi umexluq ur Iiiif seg ixef is. Ih, Mass iw deg ubrid uwqim
Ma wexxoen, ni$ ssawve$ awen d ayen i$ef id ppuceggaa$ $uowen. A d Inuef, Mass iw, agdud war kunwi. Ur T teiiuoum s wacemma. Mass iw, s tidep, d Ameareb n yal cci
Mi d iusa lameo nne£, Nsellek Hud akked wid iumnen yides, s ueunu s$uone£. Nsellek iten seg uaaqeb uwaio
Akka Aad. Nekoen issekniyen n Mass nnsen, auuan imazanen iS. Ddan d lameo n yal aqehhao iggernennen
A ten ivfeo xezzu di ddunit agi, u deg wass n tnekra. Day, war ccekk, ur jhilen ara Aad, ar Mass nnsen? Day macci: "akin Aad, agdud n Hud

I Tamud, gmat sen UuUalie, inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi! Ur tesaim oebbi, war Neppa. Neppa Ixelq ikwen seg wakal, Izzde$ ikwen fellas. Ssutret aS ssmae, sinna, steooaet aS. Mass iw, s tidep, Iqeob ed, Ippara d awal
Nnan as: "a Ualie, ni$ telliv garane$, uqbel aya, d asirem nne$. Day ad a$ tekksev aabad n wayen aabden imezwura nne$? Nekwni, s tidep, aql a$ di ccekk imcebbwel, $ef wayen u$uo la $ tneccdev
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Acu twalam ma ddi$ d ubeggen n Mass iw? Ifka yi d aeunu s$uoeS. Acu ara yi isellken seg ufus n Oebbi, ma aaua$ $uoeS? Iyi ternam, siwa taxessaot
A yagdud iw! Tagi d tal$wemt n Oebbi, d assekni i kunwi. Eooet ep a ppeks di tmurt n Oebbi. Ur p pjeyyifet, mulac a kwen id isami uaaqeb iqeoben
Gezmen as ivaoen. Inna: "zhut deg ixxamen nnwen, krav wussan. Apan lemaahda ur nepwankao
Mi d iusa lameo nne£, Nsellek Ualie akked wid iumnen yides, s ueunu s$uone£, si ddell n wass nni. Ih, Mass ik d Uohid, d Uzmir
Asu$u iwwet wid idensen, gwran d d imeslax deg ixxamen nnsen
amzun ur rbieen degsen. Day, s tidep, ur jhilen ara Tamud, ar Mass nnsen? Day macci: "akin Tamud
Ni$ usan d imceggaen nne£ ar Iboahim, s ubecceo. Nnan: "tifrat"! Inna: "tifrat"! Ur iaaiiel ara ibbwi d aajmi icwin
Mi iwala ifassen nnsen ur d eeilen ara $uoes, iseassef iten, iugad iten. Nnan: "ur ppagwad, nekwni neppuceggaa ed ar ugdud n Lui
Tameiiut is tbedd, tevua. Nbecceo ip s Iseaq, akked Yaaqub, deffir Iseaq
Tenna: "a leif iw, day a d arwe$, nek d tam$aot, u argaz agi inu, wesser? Ayagi, s tidep, d lwehma
Nnan: "day twehmev di lameo n Oebbi? Aeunu n Oebbi, akked lbaoaka S, fellawen ay at uxxam. Ih, Neppa d Amaazuz, Mucaa
Mi s tekkes tugwdi i Iboahim, u iusa t id ubecceo, inumer a£ $ef ugdud n Lui
Iboahim, s tidep, ieellem, ippanez, isteooia
A Iboahim, ur keccem deg waya. Ni$ iusa d lameo n Mass ik. Nitni, a ten id ias uaaqeb, war tifrat
Mi usan imceggaen nne£ ar Lui, innu$ben, ur isai i$il a ten ifukk. Inna: "wagi d ass uwaio

Iusa d ugdud is, zeefen d $uoes. Llan, zik, xeddmen tucmitin. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Atent an issi, nitenti zeddigit, i kunwi. Eezbet i Oebbi, ur iyi peeccimet ar inebgawen iw. Day ur illi ara, garawen, urgaz aeesbi
Nnan: "ni$ teeoiv ur nesai leeqq deg issi k. Kecc, s tidep, teeoiv d acu neb$a
Inna: "a lemmer i wen zmire$, ne$ sai$ tayep ioehden

Nnan: "a Lui, nekwni d imceggaen n Mass ik. Ur k id ppawven. Oue akked twacult ik, deg iv. Yiwen degwen ur d itezzi! Kkes ed tameiiut ik. Neppat, s tidep, a ppepwwet s wayen ara ten iwwten. Ih, ppaaud nnsen, tauebeit. Ni$ tqeob ed tuebeit
Mi d iusa lameo nne£, Nesredm ip. Nesse$li d fellas abruri n yieoa ibelbaven n talaxt
Pwanesxen ar Mass ik. Nitni, ur baiden i imednas
I Madian, gmat sen Cuaayeb, inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi! Ur tesaim oebbi, war Neppa. Ur ssenqaset di lkil akked lmizan. Nek, wala$ kwen teowam, u ugade$ fellawen aaaqeb, ass itezzin
A yagdud iw! Ktilet, weznet, s lewqama. Ur iiuoout imdanen deg wayla nnsen, ur pdenniset, tessefsadem di tmurt
Yif it i kunwi wayen d iqqimen i Oebbi, ma d lmumnin ay tellam. Ur lli$, nek, d ameareb nnwen
Nnan: "a Cuaayeb, day a$ umoen wawalen ik, a neoo ayen aabden imezwura nne$? Ne$ a nexdem, deg wayla nne$, ayen ur a$ nehwi? Kecc, s tidep, d uelim, d uuwib

Inna: "a yagdud iw! Acu twalam, ma ddi$ d ubeggen n Mass iw? I$at iyi yis, l$it imaanen. Ur b$i$ a kwen mgirrde$, siwa $ef wayen i wen gedle$. B$i$ kan, s wayen zemre$, ad awen uegme$ tikli. Laawen iw s$uo Oebbi kan. Ppekle$ fellaS, utube$ T
A yagdud iw! Awer kwen teppara nnmara w d ibe$wviyen, a ppevou yidwen akken tevoa d ugdud n Nue, ne$ win n Hud, ne$ win n Ualie! Agdud n Lui, ur ibaad ara segwen
Ssutret ssmae i Mass nnwen, sinna, steroaet aS. Mass iw, s tidep, Ipeunu, Ipeemmil
Nnan: "a Cuaayeb, ur nefhim ara aias n wayen id tenniv. Aql a$ nwala k d uohif garane$. Lemmer macci d alag ik, war ccekk, a k neooem. Ur a$ tezmirev
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Day Oebbi, $uowen, yif iT walag iw, di tezmert? Terram T ar deffir n waarur nnwen. Mass iw, s tidep, Izzi i wayen txeddmem
A yagdud iw! Xedmet deg umekkan nnwen, nek ad xedme$. Deqqal a ppeeoem, u$uo ara d ias uaaqeb ara t isdullen, anwa ay d akeddab. Aasset, nek, yidwen, ad aasse
Mi d iusa lameo nne£, Nsellek Cuaayeb akked wid iumnen yides, s ueunu s$uone£. Asu$u iwwet wid idensen, gwran d d imeslax deg ixxamen nnsen
amzun ur rbieen degsen. Day macci: "akin Madian"! Am: "akin Tamud
Ni$ Nuzen ed Musa, s issekniyen nne£, akked udabu n uuee
uo Feraun akked imvebboen is. Ddan d lameo n Feraun. Lameo n Feraun ur illi d uuwib
Ad izwir i ugdud is, ass n tnekra, a ten inheo ar usario n tmes. A yasario ucmit u$uo pwanehoen
A ten ivfeo xezzu di tagi, u deg wass n tnekra. A tikci tucmip ippunefken
Ayagi, si tequivin n temdinin, i k d Nessawal. Garasent tid ibedden, tid ipwamegren
Ur ten Nednis. Maca, densen iman nnsen. Ur ten nefaan s wacemma, ioebbiten nnsen i la naaoen, war Oebbi, mi d iusa lameo n Mass ik. I sen rnan, siwa ssxev
Akka tiyta n Mass ik. Mi Iwwet timdinin i idensen, s tidep, tiyta S teqoee, teqsee
Ih, deg waya, assekni i wid iugaden aaaqeb n laxeot. Ass nni, d ass unejmaa n yimdanen. Ass nni, d ass n ccada
A t Neswexxeo kan ar lajel iuran
Ass ideg ara d ias, ur d ipmeslay yiwen, siwa ma s tesrie iS. Ad ilin igeswaeen, isaadiyen
Wanag igeswaeen ad ilin di tmes, s unazaa d imeiii
ad wekkoen dinna, ayen ara dumen tmurt akked igenwan, siwa ma ur Irad ara Mass ik. Ih, Mass ik Ixeddem ayen i S ihwan
Wanag isaadiyen, di Loennet, ad wekkoen, dinna, ayen ara dumen tmurt akked igenwan, siwa ma ur Irad ara Mass ik. D tikci n war tilas
Ur k ikeccem ccekk $ef wayen aabden widak. Ayen aabden am wayen aabden imezwura nnsen, zik. War ccekk, ad asen Nefk amur nnsen, ur inqis
Ni$, s tidep, Nefka Tazmamt i Musa. Mgarraden fellas. Lemmer ur d izwar ara wawal s$uo Mass ik, yili useyyi garasen. Haaten, ih, di ccekk imcebbwel fellas
War ccekk, akken ma llan, ad Ikafi Mass ik igiten nnsen, s lmizan. Neppa, s tidep, Issen ayen xeddmen
Ihi, ili d uwqim, akken i k ippunefk lameo, kecc akked wid isteooaen yidek. Ur be$wvet. Neppa, s tidep, Ipwali ay txeddmem
Ur pqeooibet ar wid idensen, a kwen tnal tmes! Ur tesaim bab, war Oebbi, ihi, ur tepwasellkem
eeal ubee, tameddit, kra n lewqat n yiv. S tidep, ise$iyen neqqven tucmitin. Ayagi d asmekti i wid ismektayen
Eubeo! Oebbi, s tidep, ur Iveggia taqdiat n lauuam
A lemmer llan, di tsuta i kwen id izwaren, imezgiyen ineqqven asefsed di tmurt! Qlilit kan seg wid Nsellek segsen. Wid idensen ddan akked wayen i ten izhan, u$alen d ibe$wviyen
Ur Isquccu ara Mass ik timdinin, d aeerfi, ma llan imezda$ nnsent d lauuam
Lemmer i S ihwi i Mass ik, ad Irr imdanen d yiwen n lois. Zgan mgarraden
Kkes ed wid i$ef Ieun Mass ik. Ixelq iten i wayagi. Itam wawal n Mass ik: "ad Acaoe$ Loahennama, war ccekk, s leonun akked yimdanen mejmulen
Ayen akw i k ed Neeka n tmucuha imazanen, iwakken a Ntebbet ul ik, yissent. Id iusan dagi d tidep, d anabi u d asmekti i lmumnin
Ini i wid ur numin ara: "xedmet ay tzemrem, nekwni s tidep, la nxeddem
Gganit, nekwni la nepgani
N Oebbi tabavnit n tmurt akked igenwan. £uoeS ara u$alen akw lumuo. Ihi, aabed iT, ppkel fellaS. Ur I$effel ara Mass ik, $ef wayen txeddmem
